name: codex-prd
description: PRD Extension for Codex CLI - Context-Driven Development with Ultra-Thinking and PRD Generation
author: Vedant Parmar

integration.notes: AGENT.md loads all protocols and context for the Codex Agent

commands./setup: Initialize project with product, tech stack, and workflow
commands./newTrack: Start new feature/bug track with spec and plan generation
commands./implement: Autonomous implementation following the active plan
commands./status: View current project and track status
commands./validate: Validate code against PRD and specs
commands./prd:generate: Generate comprehensive PRD for a product idea
